trans-unit.source: Represents the personalization attribute.
trans-unit.target: 代表個人化屬性。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The personalization attribute, `Personalizable`, is applied to public control properties that need to persist personalization information.
trans-unit.target: 個人化屬性， `Personalizable`，套用至公用的控制項屬性需要保存個人化資訊。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET automatically generates the code to persist or retrieve these values from the underlying data store when the control is in a Web Parts zone on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會自動產生程式碼保存或 Web 組件頁面上的 Web 組件區域中控制項時，從基礎資料存放區擷取這些值。

trans-unit.source: The following requirements must be met for a property to be marked as personalizable: - The property must be public and must have public get and set accessors.
trans-unit.target: 將會標示為可個人化的屬性必須符合下列需求:-屬性必須是公用的和必須擁有公用的 get 和 set 存取子。

trans-unit.source: - The property must be a read/write property.
trans-unit.target: -屬性必須是讀/寫屬性。

trans-unit.source: - The property must be without parameters.
trans-unit.target: -屬性必須是不含參數。

trans-unit.source: - The property cannot be indexed.
trans-unit.target: -屬性無法編製索引。

trans-unit.source: Code is automatically generated to load and save personalization data for properties.
trans-unit.target: 載入及儲存個人化資料的屬性自動產生程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Properties that support personalization are determined based on the existence of this attribute on the property and the fact that the property conforms to the constraints listed above.
trans-unit.target: 支援個人化的屬性會取決於屬性和屬性符合上面所列的條件約束事實的這個屬性的存在。

trans-unit.source: Note that read-only and write-only properties are not supported for personalization.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，唯讀和唯寫屬性不支援個人化。

trans-unit.source: Applying this attribute to a read-only or write-only property results in an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 將此屬性套用至唯讀或唯寫屬性會導致<xref:System.Web.HttpException>擲回。</xref:System.Web.HttpException>

trans-unit.source: Parameterized properties also throw an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 參數化的屬性也會擲回<xref:System.Web.HttpException>例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.HttpException>

trans-unit.source: Individual properties without this attribute are excluded from personalization if no special handling through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable> interface is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果透過任何特殊處理，個別的屬性，但不使用這個屬性會從個人化排除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable>會使用介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[Web 組件個人化概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor internally sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A> property to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> property to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式在內部設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>屬性`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>屬性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref> class using the provided parameter.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref>類別使用所提供的參數。

trans-unit.source: This constructor internally sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A> property to the value of the Boolean parameter, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> property to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式在內部設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>屬性設為值的布林值參數，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>屬性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is useful if you want a derived type to mark a virtual property that is personalizable on the base type as not-personalizable on the derived type.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式是很有用，如果您想化成不可個人化的衍生型別上的基底類型的虛擬屬性標示的衍生型別。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether the property can be personalized.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否可以個人化的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref> class using the provided parameter.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref>類別使用所提供的參數。

trans-unit.source: This constructor internally sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A> property to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> property to the parameter specified, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式在內部設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>屬性`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>屬性來指定，參數和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>屬性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> indicating the scope of the personalization.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref>指出的個人化範圍。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref> class using the provided parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref>類別使用提供的參數。

trans-unit.source: This constructor internally sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A> property to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> property to the first parameter specified, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> property to the second parameter specified.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式在內部設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>屬性`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>屬性至第一個參數指定，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>屬性，以指定的第二個參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> indicating the scope of the personalization.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref>指出的個人化範圍。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether the property information is considered sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否視為機密之屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: Returns an attribute instance that indicates no support for personalization.
trans-unit.target: 傳回屬性執行個體，指出不支援個人化。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: This field is used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位搭配用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: This field and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.NotPersonalizable> field have the same value.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.NotPersonalizable>欄位具有相同的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.NotPersonalizable>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: When overridden, returns a Boolean evaluation of the current instance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref> and another <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref> instance supplied as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫時，會傳回目前執行個體的布林值評估<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref>和另一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref>當做參數提供的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> instances are considered equal if their <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> property settings are the same.
trans-unit.target: 兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>執行個體都視為相等，如果其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>屬性設定都相同。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref> to be compared to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"> </xref>比較目前的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the values are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果值不相等。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden, returns a hash code of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫時，會傳回屬性的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: The hash code is based on an attribute's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> property settings.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊程式碼為基礎的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>

trans-unit.source: A hash code in the form of an integer.
trans-unit.target: 形式的整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> objects for the properties that match the parameter type and are marked as personalizable.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的集合<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>屬性，符合參數型別，並且會標示為可個人化的物件。</xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: This method returns a collection containing zero or more <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> objects, with one object in the collection for each property of the type specified that is marked as being personalizable, where <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A> equals `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回集合，其中包含零或多個<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>物件，與每一個屬性，也就是指定之型別的集合中的一個物件標示為正在執行可個人化，其中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>等於`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A> </xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: The `type` parameter is the type on which to look for `Personalizable` properties.
trans-unit.target: `type`參數是要尋找類型`Personalizable`屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you would pass in `"typeof(MyWebPart)"` to get the `Personalizable` properties on the `MyWebPart` class.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以在中傳遞`"typeof(MyWebPart)"`取得`Personalizable`屬性`MyWebPart`類別。

trans-unit.source: The type on which to look for <xref uid="langword_csharp_Personalizable" name="Personalizable" href=""></xref> properties.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找類型<xref uid="langword_csharp_Personalizable" name="Personalizable" href=""></xref>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of personalizable properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>的可個人化的屬性。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: A public property on the type is marked as personalizable but is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 型別上的公用屬性標示為可個人化，但處於唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: When overridden, returns a value that indicates whether the attribute instance equals the value of the static <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Default"></xref> field.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫時，傳回值，指出屬性執行個體是否等於值的靜態<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Default"></xref>欄位。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Default> field indicates no support for personalization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Default>欄位指出不支援個人化。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Default>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the attribute instance equals the static <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Default"></xref> field; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>屬性的執行個體等於靜態<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Default"></xref>欄位，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the setting that indicates whether the attribute can be personalized, as established by one of the constructors.
trans-unit.target: 取得指出是否可以個人化屬性，其中一個建構函式所建立的設定。

trans-unit.source: This value is set when an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> class is created.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體時，這個值會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>類別建立。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property can be personalized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可個人化的屬性。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the setting that indicates whether the attribute is sensitive, as established by one of the constructors.
trans-unit.target: 取得指出屬性是否區分大小寫，其中一個建構函式所建立的設定。

trans-unit.source: This value is set when an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> class is created.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體時，這個值會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>類別建立。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: This property controls how the property value is exported.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性控制匯出的屬性值的方式。

trans-unit.source: If the property is set to `true`, it will not be exported when the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為`true`，不會匯出時的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property is sensitive; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果屬性是機密的。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current instance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref> and the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref> have the same <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable*> property value.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否目前的執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref>和指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref>具有相同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable*>屬性值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable*>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to match properties that have the same <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法與具有相同的屬性相符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"></xref> to be compared to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute"> </xref>比較目前的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two attributes have the same <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable*> value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果兩個屬性具有相同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable*>值; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable*>

trans-unit.source: Returns an attribute instance that indicates no support for personalization.
trans-unit.target: 傳回屬性執行個體，指出不支援個人化。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: This field and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> field have the same value.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>欄位具有相同的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns an attribute instance that indicates support for personalization.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指示支援個人化的屬性執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: This attribute instance has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> property set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> and its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的執行個體都有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>及其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>屬性設定為`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> enumeration value for the class instance, as set by one of the constructors.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref>類別執行個體所設定的建構函式的其中一個列舉值。

trans-unit.source: This value is set when an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> class is created.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體時，這個值會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>類別建立。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: This property controls when the property value is saved and loaded, depending on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A> property of the page.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會控制當屬性值是儲存和載入，取決於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>頁的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Returns an attribute instance that indicates support for personalization with a shared scope.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指示支援具有共用範圍的個人化的屬性執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: This attribute instance has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> property set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> and its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的執行個體都有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>及其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>屬性設定為`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns an attribute instance that indicates support for personalization in <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指示支援中的個人化的屬性執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref>範圍。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: This attribute instance has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A> property set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> and its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的執行個體都有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>及其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>屬性設定為`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>
